page.title: 08Nantwich-Local Events.
page.content: On Thursday and Saturday there is a market which sells mostly fruit and vegetables.Monthly there are furniture Auction sales and Antique Fairs in the old church school.Annually there is an{Old English Fair}on the square.The money goes to charity,like that from the Festival of Queens. The Agricultural show in Dorfold Park attracts hundreds of people to see the one day show.The{Flower Festival}is held in St.Mary's church.It has lots of arrangments on one theme.Sports week is in May when all local clubs organise competitions.The finals of each event are on Saturday. Our{Town Crier}wears a civil war suit and calls out local news on Saturdays. Each January there is a mock battle near the river to remember{Holy Holly {Day,}when{Dabbers}wore holly in their hats to celebrate parliament's victory
